ErrorPopUpDescription: During MyTourMaker execution, following error has occurred:
OverpassError: MyTourMaker could not connect to any of the built-in Overpass API servers. Try entering a custom Overpass API server URL below.
ErrorReturnedByOverpass1: Overpass API server returned an error:
ErrorReturnedByOverpass2: Maybe the temporary quota for it has been exceeded
OSMConnectionError: Could not connect to the OSM servers! Determining the issue...
ErrorCheckFirewall: Please check your firewall configuration, as well as if any major web companies are having outages right now!
ErrorOSMUnavailable: OSM servers seem to be unavailable right now. Check your firewall and DNS settings or try later.
ErrorIPGeoAddressFail: Unable to get the IP address location
ErrorNominatimAddressSearch: Unable to resolve your address! Please enter a full address or coordinates.
ErrorNotEnoughPOIs: Not enough POIs in set area! Try making a tour with different requirements!
ErrorUnableToRequestPOIs: Unable to request POIs for key
ErrorORSAPI: OpenRouteService API error! Try checking connection to https://openrouteservice.org or making a tour with smaller distance between waypoints!
ErrorFileExists: Error - file with entered name already exists!
ErrorOverpassWentOffline: Multiple Overpass API requests have failed! Most likely the Overpass API server went offline! Please try restarting MyTourMaker!
DetermineStartPointTitle: Do you want your starting point to be here?
TourPreconditionsScreenTitle: Let's set the basics of our tour first...
PlanATourDescription: You can add up to 69 points of interest in one tour.
